title: Trusting Him
description: Since the day he left prison, Michael Carsonsought a second chance. Helping troubledteens in a church youth group seemed agood place to start. Working alongside youthleader Maggie Simmons, Michael could seehis new life before him—a life he hopedwould include smart, pretty Maggie. Butbecause of her painful past, she was wary oftrusting anyone, least of all an ex-con. Whencircumstances beyond his control threatenedto pull him away from Maggie and thekids, Michael prayed he could resist oldtemptations and keep God—and Maggie—close to his heart.
author: Brenda Minton
